pr_title: [#3591] Datascript to delete specified iterations for a survey instance

timeline.message:
[#3591] Datascript to delete specified iterations for a survey instance

* Delete one or more iterations by specifying at the command line
* Update the iteration index in the responses if needed (not strictly necessary)
* Update the dependency libraries

timeline.bodyText: what happens is formId is null?
timeline.author: valllllll2000

replies.bodyText: if we have only one question group matching then the data is deleted correctly but if for example we have two forms with the same question group, then we get an exception and cannot perform any updates.
replies.author: muloem
